Private Litigation Case Title: Beauperthuy et al v. 24 Hour Fitness USA, Inc. et al
Boyce, et al v. Sports And Fitness, et al

Description: The District Attorneys of Contra Costa and Orange counties obtained nationwide restitution and a $1.3 million settlement from 24 Hour Fitness over allegations that the company misled longtime members on fixed annual renewal rates.
